撡字的基本解释

撡
cāo
古同“操”。

撡字的汉语字典释义

[①]［cāo］
［《廣韻》七刀切，平豪，清。］
［《廣韻》七到切，去号，清。］
亦作“撡1”。
(1)执持；拿着。
(2)掌握，控制。
(3)操纵；运用。
(4)弹奏；讲说。
(5)军队的操练、演习。
(6)指按照一定姿势运动肢体的体育锻炼。
(7)做；从事。
(8)操守；志节。
(9)琴曲。
(10)詈词。
(11)通“躁”。蹙迫。
(12)通“躁”。暴躁。参见“操惡”、“操暴”、“操嗔”。
(13)姓。宋有操斗祥，明有操守经。见《万姓统谱》。

撡字的康熙字典解释

【卯集中】【手字部】　撡； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页455第07
俗摻字。一曰俗操字。【戰國策】荆軻持匕首揕之，秦王驚，自引而起，拔劒，劒長撡其室。【註】撡與操同。別詳摻操兩字註。

暂无。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［cāo］
["Guangyun" seven-size-fits-all, Pinghao, Qing. ]
["Guangyun" Qi to cut, go to the number, clear. ]
Also known as "撡1".
(1) Hold; hold.
(2) Master and control.
(3) Manipulate; use.
(4) Playing; speaking.
(5) Military drills and exercises.
(6) Refers to the physical exercise of moving the limbs according to a certain posture.
(7) Do; engage in.
(8) Conduct; Zhi section.
(9) Music for piano.
(10) Abuse words.
(11) Through "impatient". Frustrated.
(12) Through "impatient". irritable. See "fuck evil", "fuck violence", "fuck hate".
(13) Last name. Song You Cao Dou Xiang, Ming has ethics scripture. See "The Genealogy of Wan Xing".

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Ji] [Hand Character Department] 　撡; Kangxi Strokes: 16; Page Number: Page 455 No. 07
Vulgar mixed words. The first is the vulgar word. [Warring States Policy] Jing Ke held a dagger and flicked it, and the King of Qin was shocked. [Note] Fuck and act the same. Don't mix up the two-character note in detail.
